/* memberMypage-주문내역 조회 */ select p.p_no ,p.p_abprice ,p.p_date ,p.m_no ,p.p_totprice ,p.p_discount ,p.coupon_code ,p.m_phone ,p.m_post_address ,p.m_name
from BOOKING_PURCHASE_DELIVERY d , booking_purchase p where d.p_no(+)=p.p_no and m_no=( select m_no from booking_member where m_id = #{m_id} ) order by p.p_no

/* memberMypage-배송상태 조회 */ select d.del_company_name ,d.p_no ,d.del_ondate ,d.del_num ,d.del_site ,d.del_status ,d.del_company_phone from BOOKING_PURCHASE_DELIVERY d , booking_purchase p where d.p_no(+)=p.p_no and m_no=( select m_no from booking_member where m_id = #{m_id} ) and d.del_num is not null order by p.p_no
/* memberDetail - 주문내역 책, 수량 */ select b.b_title ,b.b_author ,prt.p_amount from booking_book_data b inner join booking_book_purchase_rel prt on b.isbn = prt.isbn where prt.p_no = #{p_no}

/* memberMypage-주문내역 총레코드수 조회 */ SELECT NVL(count(1), 0) FROM (SELECT list.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( select p.p_no ,p.p_abprice ,p.p_date ,p.m_no ,p.p_totprice ,p.p_discount ,p.coupon_code ,p.m_phone ,p.m_post_address ,p.m_name
from BOOKING_PURCHASE_DELIVERY d , booking_purchase p where d.p_no(+)=p.p_no and m_no=( select m_no from booking_member where m_id = #{m_id} ) order by p.p_no ) list )

/* memberMypage-배송내셕 총레코드수 조회 */ SELECT NVL(count(1), 0) FROM (SELECT list.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( select d.del_company_name ,d.p_no ,d.del_ondate ,d.del_num ,d.del_site ,d.del_status ,d.del_company_phone from BOOKING_PURCHASE_DELIVERY d , booking_purchase p where d.p_no(+)=p.p_no and m_no=( select m_no from booking_member where m_id = #{m_id} ) and d.del_num is not null order by p.p_no ) list )
